name: Light Detracts Bugs
description:
Play as a Lightbulb who can manipulate electricity to their advantage!

Your objective is to find the Cyan Lightbulb, hidden somewhere deep in the world...

Created by me in 3 days for 2022 Zeno GameJam. This is my first ever public game, expect a few bugs.

CONTROLS:

Move: WASD

Jump: Space (Hold for Longer)

Use Light: MouseDown

Created by me. Sounds are mostly all from Pixabay, except for one created by my brother.
